title: Laura Pidcock – 2020 Comments on Rebecca Long-Bailey
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the comments made on Twitter by Laura Pidcock on 26 June 2020.
content:
Solidarity with Rebecca Long-Bailey. And solidarity with every member feeling unsure about their future in the party. A strong and well organised left in the Party has power. I am staying and organising.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
